dict.acceptation: 你的；你们的；（用于书信结尾的签名前）您的诚挚的；

sent.orig: Use mine, yours, his or hers in place of the words in italics.
sent.trans: 用mine, yours, his或hers替换斜体字.

sent.orig: Jane , I'm yours. Gah, I'm yours, I'm yours and soul Much good that is.
sent.trans: 简, 我是你的, 我是你的,是你的, 全心全意,也许不值一提.

sent.orig: Wealth that you hoard is not yours , wealth ymcf that you have given is really yours.
sent.trans: 你囤积起来的财富并不是你的, 你布施出去的财富才真正是你的.

sent.orig: The characteristics that were yours at birth were yours for a reason.
sent.trans: 你拥有你与生俱来的个性特征是有理由的.
